network_overview: The capture contains only LTE control-plane signaling (S1-AP/X2-AP over SCTP) plus a single DNS query; no user-plane (GTP-U) or IMS traffic is present. 100 % of the S1-AP procedures (Proc-11/12/13/23) and Diameter exchanges (Cmd-316/318) show zero success rate, indicating every transaction failed or was rejected.

observations.finding: All 72 S1-AP procedure attempts (Proc-11/12/13/23) lack any successful outcome, producing 0 % success rate.
All 6 Diameter policy sessions (Cmd-316/318) are answered with Result-Code 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS) yet still counted as failures, revealing a KPI-calculation bug or missing response-matching.
Zero VoLTE/IMS calls, registrations or RTP streams detected; voice service is absent in this slice.

root_causes.description: Every S1-AP transaction (attach, bearer setup, handover, etc.) is rejected or unanswered, implying the MME is either overloaded, mis-configured, or the eNB is sending malformed requests.
root_causes.impact: UEs cannot camp on the cell; no data or voice service possible.

root_causes.description: Cmd-316 & 318 receive 2001 Success yet are still logged as 0 % success, indicating the analytics engine is not correlating answers to requests correctly.
root_causes.impact: False-positive alarms and incorrect SLA reporting.

recommendations.action: Investigate MME logs for the exact S1-AP reject causes (e.g., Missing-IE, Unknown-UE, PLMN-not-allowed) matching the Proc-11/12/13/23 attempts.
recommendations.rationale: Determines whether failures are due to configuration, overload, or eNB mis-behavior.

recommendations.action: Fix the KPI correlation logic so Diameter Result-Code 2001 is counted as success.
recommendations.rationale: Prevents false outage alarms and gives accurate QoS metrics.

recommendations.action: Enable GTP-U capture on S1-U to verify whether user-plane bearers are actually established despite control-plane rejections.
recommendations.rationale: Confirms if the 0 % success rate is real or a reporting artifact.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Control-plane is completely non-functional: every S1-AP procedure fails; Diameter policy sessions succeed at protocol level but are mis-reported.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP tunnels detected; user-plane is idle.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No IMS or RTP traffic present; voice service unavailable.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Signaling failures prevent any user-plane or voice bearer creation.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant eNB
    participant MME
    Note over eNB,MME: All S1-AP procedures fail
    eNB->>MME: Proc-12 (Initial UE msg)
    MME-->>eNB: Reject / No Response
    eNB->>MME: Proc-13 (UE Context Setup)
    MME-->>eNB: Reject / No Response
    loop Every 30 ms
        eNB->>MME: Proc-11/13 Retries
        MME-->>eNB: Still failing
    end
    Note right of MME: 0 % success for all procedures
